# Skyscraper City Hide Autogenerated Avatars (185773)

### Information
- Author: skalee (unknown)
- Created at: unknown
- Updated at: 6/25/2020, 2:13:41 PM
- License: NO-REDISTRIBUTION
- Category: skyscrapercity
- Rating: undefined
- Total installs: 8
- Weekly installs: 1


### Description
Hides confusing "default avatars" which are assigned to people who haven't specified any.
